content:
XamlLanguage Class

In this Article

Defines constants that provide strings or objects that are useful for XAML markup or for programming with XAML types. These strings or objects are relevant to XAML language concepts, to the implementation of XAML language concepts in .NET Framework XAML Services, or to both.

Syntax

Declaration

public static class XamlLanguage

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • XamlLanguage

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ToString()

Remarks

The XamlLanguage API returns lookup results that are based on a XAML schema context that remains internal. In this schema context, SupportMarkupExtensionsWithDuplicateArity is true. Otherwise, the XAML schema context that is reported as the default for .NET Framework XAML Services and its defined XAML readers and XAML writers uses default settings. Overall, the XAML schema context that is used for predefined XAML readers and XAML writers is based on the same XamlSchemaContext instance that is available from APIs that set or return a XamlSchemaContext. The default XAML schema context for .NET Framework XAML Services is based on CLR concepts and reflection. Evidence of the default CLR backing can be found when obtaining certain XamlLanguage properties that are a XamlType and when checking UnderlyingType. Similarly, XamlLanguage properties that are a XamlMember have CLR reflection-based values for UnderlyingMember.

Fields summary

Xaml2006Namespace

Gets a string value for the string that identifies the XAML (2006) language namespace. That namespace corresponds to the XAML (2006) "x" prefixed namespace as defined in [MS-XAML] Section 5.1.1.
Xml1998Namespace

Gets a string value for the string that identifies the XML (1998) language namespace. That namespace corresponds to the XML "xml" prefixed namespace as referenced in [MS-XAML] Section 5.1.2.

Properties summary

AllDirectives

Gets a read-only generic collection of each XamlDirective identifier that is defined by .NET Framework XAML Services.
AllTypes

Gets a read-only generic collection of individual XamlType values that match, or alias, a XAML language intrinsic that is defined by .NET Framework XAML Services.
Arguments

Gets a XamlDirective for the Arguments of a factory method or a generic usage.
Array

Gets a XamlType for the Array XAML language intrinsic.
AsyncRecords

Gets a XamlDirective for the AsyncRecords pseudomember.
Base

Gets a XamlDirective for the base directive from XML.
Boolean

Gets a XamlType for the Boolean XAML language intrinsic.
Byte

Gets a XamlType for the Byte XAML language intrinsic.
Char

Gets a XamlType for the Char XAML language intrinsic.
Class

Gets a XamlDirective for the Class directive from XAML.
ClassAttributes

Gets a XamlDirective for the ClassAttributes directive from XAML.
ClassModifier

Gets a XamlDirective for the ClassModifier directive from XAML.
Code

Gets a XamlDirective for Code as detailed in [MS-XAML].
ConnectionId

Gets a XamlDirective that identifies a connection point for wiring events to handlers.
Decimal

Gets a XamlType for the Decimal XAML language intrinsic.
Double

Gets a XamlType for the Double XAML language intrinsic.
FactoryMethod

Gets a XamlDirective that identifies a factory method for XAML.
FieldModifier

Gets a XamlDirective for the FieldModifier directive from XAML.
Initialization

Gets a XamlDirective for the Initialization directive from XAML.
Int16

Gets a XamlType for the Int16 XAML language intrinsic.
Int32

Gets a XamlType for the Int32 XAML language intrinsic.
Int64

Gets a XamlType for the Int64 XAML language intrinsic.
Items

Gets a XamlDirective for the Items directive from XAML.
Key

Gets a XamlDirective for the Key directive from XAML.
Lang

Gets a XamlDirective for the lang directive from XML.
Member

Gets a XamlType for the type that is the item type of stem.Xaml.XamlLanguage.Members*.
Members

Gets a XamlDirective for the Members concept in XAML.
Name

Gets a XamlDirective for the Name directive from XAML.
Null

Gets a XamlType for the Null or NullExtension XAML language intrinsic.
Object

Gets a XamlType for the Object XAML language concept.
PositionalParameters

Gets a XamlDirective for the PositionalParameters directive from XAML.
Property

Gets a XamlType for the Property concept in XAML.
Reference

Gets a XamlType that represents a Reference for XAML.
Shared

Gets a XamlDirective for the Shared directive for XAML.
Single

Gets a XamlType for the Single XAML language intrinsic.
Space

Gets a XamlDirective for the space directive from XML.
Static

Gets a XamlType for the Static/StaticExtension XAML language intrinsic.
String

Gets a XamlType for the String XAML language intrinsic.
Subclass

Gets a XamlDirective for the Subclass directive from XAML.
SynchronousMode

Gets a XamlDirective that enables loading XAML asynchronously if the XAML processor supports such a mode.
TimeSpan

Gets a XamlType for the TimeSpan concept in XAML language.
Type

Gets a XamlType for the Type/TypeExtension XAML language intrinsic.
TypeArguments

Gets a XamlDirective for the TypeArguments directive from XAML.
Uid

Gets a XamlDirective for the Uid directive from XAML.
UnknownContent

Gets a XamlDirective for the UnknownContent directive from XAML.
Uri

Gets a XamlType for the Uri XAML language concept.
XamlNamespaces

Gets a collection of the namespace identifiers for XAML.
XData

Gets a XamlType for the XAML type that backs an XData block in XAML.
XmlNamespaces

Gets a collection of the namespace identifiers for XML.

Fields

  • Xaml2006Namespace

    Gets a string value for the string that identifies the XAML (2006) language namespace. That namespace corresponds to the XAML (2006) "x" prefixed namespace as defined in [MS-XAML] Section 5.1.1.

    public const string Xaml2006Namespace;
  • Xml1998Namespace

    Gets a string value for the string that identifies the XML (1998) language namespace. That namespace corresponds to the XML "xml" prefixed namespace as referenced in [MS-XAML] Section 5.1.2.

    public const string Xml1998Namespace;

Properties

  • AllDirectives

    Gets a read-only generic collection of each XamlDirective identifier that is defined by .NET Framework XAML Services.

    public static System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.Xaml.XamlDirective> AllDirectives { get; }

    Property Value

    • ReadOnlyCollection<XamlDirective>

      A read-only generic collection of each XamlDirective identifier that is defined by .NET Framework XAML Services.

  • AllTypes

    Gets a read-only generic collection of individual XamlType values that match, or alias, a XAML language intrinsic that is defined by .NET Framework XAML Services.

    public static System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.Xaml.XamlType> AllTypes { get; }

    Property Value

    • ReadOnlyCollection<XamlType>

      A read-only generic collection of each XamlType that matches a XAML language intrinsic.

    Remarks

    See [MS-XAML] Section 5.2 for a list of intrinsic XAML language information items. Note that not all items that are listed as subsections of 5.2 are implemented as a XamlType. For example, x:Code is not a type.

  • Arguments

    Gets a XamlDirective for the Arguments of a factory method or a generic usage.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective Arguments { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective for the Arguments of a factory method or generic usage.

    Remarks

    A factory method is a XAML2009 feature for identifying an alternative technique that constructs the underlying type for a XAML type. The Arguments specify the input of a factory method and enable specifying that information in markup. The default techniques, in absence of a factory method, are to attempt to find a default constructor and then attempt to find an identified type converter for type, member, or destination type.

    For the generic usage, the Arguments wrap the objects or initialization text of all construction inputs that are specified as necessary for the TypeArguments.

  • Array

    Gets a XamlType for the Array XAML language intrinsic.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlType Array { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlType

      A XamlType for the Array XAML language intrinsic.

    Remarks

    See [MS-XAML] Section 5.2.18.

  • AsyncRecords

    Gets a XamlDirective for the AsyncRecords pseudomember.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective AsyncRecords { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective for the AsyncRecords pseudomember.

    Remarks

    The AsyncRecords concept is part of XAML2009. See XAML 2009 Language Features.

  • Base

    Gets a XamlDirective for the base directive from XML.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective Base { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective for the base directive from XML.

    Remarks

    See [MS-XAML] Section 5.3.15.

  • Boolean

    Gets a XamlType for the Boolean XAML language intrinsic.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlType Boolean { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlType

      A XamlType for the Boolean XAML language intrinsic.

    Remarks

    See [MS-XAML] Section 5.2.17.

  • Byte

    Gets a XamlType for the Byte XAML language intrinsic.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlType Byte { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlType

      A XamlType for the Byte XAML language intrinsic.

    Remarks

    See [MS-XAML] Section 5.2.10.

  • Char

    Gets a XamlType for the Char XAML language intrinsic.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlType Char { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlType

      A XamlType for the Char XAML language intrinsic.

    Remarks

    See [MS-XAML] Section 5.2.7.

  • Class

    Gets a XamlDirective for the Class directive from XAML.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective Class { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective for the Class directive from XAML.

    Remarks

    See [MS-XAML] Section 5.3.7.

  • ClassAttributes

    Gets a XamlDirective for the ClassAttributes directive from XAML.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective ClassAttributes { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective for the ClassAttributes directive from XAML.

    Remarks

    This directive is part of XAML2009. See XAML 2009 Language Features.

  • ClassModifier

    Gets a XamlDirective for the ClassModifier directive from XAML.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective ClassModifier { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective for the ClassModifier directive from XAML.

    Remarks

    See [MS-XAML] Section 5.3.9.

  • Code

    Gets a XamlDirective for Code as detailed in [MS-XAML].

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective Code { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective for Code as detailed in [MS-XAML].

    Remarks

    See [MS-XAML] Section 5.2.22, where Code is indicated as a type; however, Code is provided as a XamlDirective by this API.

  • ConnectionId

    Gets a XamlDirective that identifies a connection point for wiring events to handlers.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective ConnectionId { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective that identifies a connection point for wiring events to handlers.

  • Decimal

    Gets a XamlType for the Decimal XAML language intrinsic.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlType Decimal { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlType

      A XamlType for the Decimal XAML language intrinsic.

    Remarks

    See [MS-XAML] Section 5.2.14.

  • Double

    Gets a XamlType for the Double XAML language intrinsic.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlType Double { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlType

      A XamlType for the Double XAML language intrinsic.

    Remarks

    See [MS-XAML] Section 5.2.9.

  • FactoryMethod

    Gets a XamlDirective that identifies a factory method for XAML.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective FactoryMethod { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective that identifies a factory method for XAML.

    Remarks

    A factory method is a XAML2009 feature for identifying an alternative technique that constructs the underlying type for a XAML type. The default technique, if a factory method is unavailable, is to try to find a default constructor, and then try to find an identified type converter on type, member, or destination type.

  • FieldModifier

    Gets a XamlDirective for the FieldModifier directive from XAML.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective FieldModifier { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective for the FieldModifier directive from XAML.

    Remarks

    See [MS-XAML] Section 5.3.10.

  • Initialization

    Gets a XamlDirective for the Initialization directive from XAML.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective Initialization { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective for the Initialization directive from XAML.

    Remarks

    This directive represents the XAML node or XAML information set representation of initialization text, where a string within an object element supplies the type construction information for the surrounding object element.

    If you are looking at raw node interpretations or visualizations, Initialization is sometimes seen in string form as _Initialization (note the leading underscore) and is within the XAML language XAML namespace (as notated by a preceding Namespace node). In [MS-XAML], this concept is described under the heading x:InitializationText. See [MS-XAML] Section 5.3.3.

  • Int16

    Gets a XamlType for the Int16 XAML language intrinsic.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlType Int16 { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlType

      A XamlType for the Int16 XAML language intrinsic.

    Remarks

    See [MS-XAML] Section 5.2.11.

  • Int32

    Gets a XamlType for the Int32 XAML language intrinsic.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlType Int32 { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlType

      A XamlType for the Int32 XAML language intrinsic.

    Remarks

    See [MS-XAML] Section 5.2.12.

  • Int64

    Gets a XamlType for the Int64 XAML language intrinsic.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlType Int64 { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlType

      A XamlType for the Int64 XAML language intrinsic.

    Remarks

    See [MS-XAML] Section 5.2.13.

  • Items

    Gets a XamlDirective for the Items directive from XAML.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective Items { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective for the Items directive from XAML.

    Remarks

    An Items directive is a node representation wrapper around multiple object values within a surrounding object. See [MS-XAML] Section 5.3.1.

    If you examine raw XAML node stream interpretations or visualizations, Items is sometimes seen in string form as _Items (note the leading underscore) and is within the XAML language XAML namespace (as notated by a preceding Namespace node).

  • Key

    Gets a XamlDirective for the Key directive from XAML.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective Key { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective for the Key directive from XAML.

    Remarks

    A Key directive is used for objects in a dictionary. See [MS-XAML] Section 5.3.5.

  • Lang

    Gets a XamlDirective for the lang directive from XML.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective Lang { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective for the lang directive from XML.

    Remarks

    See [MS-XAML] Section 5.3.13.

  • Member

    Gets a XamlType for the type that is the item type of stem.Xaml.XamlLanguage.Members*.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlType Member { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlType

      A XamlType for the type that is the item type of stem.Xaml.XamlLanguage.Members*.

    Remarks

    In the .NET Framework XAML Services implementation, the Member XamlType is backed by System.Windows.Markup.MemberDefinition.

  • Members

    Gets a XamlDirective for the Members concept in XAML.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective Members { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective for the Members concept in XAML.

    Remarks

    The Members concept is not specifically defined in [MS-XAML]. Members is a concept for defining members of types in markup itself, as opposed to referencing backing types. For more information, see PropertyDefinition.

  • Name

    Gets a XamlDirective for the Name directive from XAML.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective Name { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective for the Name directive from XAML.

    Remarks

    A Name directive is used for identifiers of objects in markup. See [MS-XAML] Section 5.3.4.

    Although this concept of Name is not completely consistent with the use that is specified in [MS-XAML], you can typically use the Name directive or the Name attribute to provide a conceptual connection between XAML objects in markup and the run-time representations that are created by XAML processing of the markup. This use depends on how specific frameworks implement their programming models to integrate XAML into their general object models. For more information, see x:Name Directive.

  • Null

    Gets a XamlType for the Null or NullExtension XAML language intrinsic.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlType Null { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlType

      A XamlType for the Null/NullExtension XAML language intrinsic.

    Remarks

    This XAML type provides null values for object values in markup. The XAML type is (or must be) assignable to MarkupExtension. See [MS-XAML] Section 5.2.4.

  • Object

    Gets a XamlType for the Object XAML language concept.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlType Object { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlType

      A XamlType for the Object XAML language concept.

    Remarks

    XAML specifies x:Object as a special language concept. See [MS-XAML] Section 5.2.5.

  • PositionalParameters

    Gets a XamlDirective for the PositionalParameters directive from XAML.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective PositionalParameters { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective for the PositionalParameters directive from XAML.

    Remarks

    PositionalParameters is a directive that wraps the multiple objects that can be specified as a set of object nodes for input of a markup extension. See [MS-XAML] Section 6.6.7.

    If you are looking at raw node interpretations or visualizations, PositionalParameters is sometimes seen in string form as _PositionalParameters (note the leading underscore) and is within the XAML language XAML namespace (as notated by a preceding Namespace node).

  • Property

    Gets a XamlType for the Property concept in XAML.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlType Property { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlType

      A XamlType for the Property concept in XAML.

    Remarks

    Property is a specialized form of the XAML type that is identified as Member.

  • Reference

    Gets a XamlType that represents a Reference for XAML.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlType Reference { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlType

      A XamlType that represents a Reference for XAML.

    Remarks

    Reference is a XAML2009 feature for referencing another object node in the markup. The implementation for .NET Framework XAML Services is found in System.Windows.Markup.Reference.

  • Shared

    Gets a XamlDirective for the Shared directive for XAML.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective Shared { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective for the Shared directive for XAML.

    Remarks

    A Shared directive (when it is set to true) specifies that when an item is found in a dictionary, references to the object should always return the singleton instead of a new instance. This behavior is related to the concept that a dictionary might be used as a source for a shared content or template mechanism by particular frameworks that use XAML. Shared is not specified in [MS-XAML] but is part of the x namespacedefined behavior for XAML in WPF and .NET Framework version 3.0 and version 3.5.

  • Single

    Gets a XamlType for the Single XAML language intrinsic.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlType Single { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlType

      A XamlType for the Single XAML language intrinsic.

    Remarks

    See [MS-XAML] Section 5.2.8.

  • Space

    Gets a XamlDirective for the space directive from XML.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective Space { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective for the space directive from XML.

    Remarks

    See [MS-XAML] Section 5.3.14.

  • Static

    Gets a XamlType for the Static/StaticExtension XAML language intrinsic.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlType Static { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlType

      A XamlType for the Static/StaticExtension XAML language intrinsic.

    Remarks

    This XAML type provides values for markup where the backing member is a static member. The XAML type is (or must be) assignable to MarkupExtension. See [MS-XAML] Section 5.2.2.

  • String

    Gets a XamlType for the String XAML language intrinsic.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlType String { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlType

      A XamlType for the String XAML language intrinsic.

    Remarks

    See [MS-XAML] Section 5.2.6.

  • Subclass

    Gets a XamlDirective for the Subclass directive from XAML.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective Subclass { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective for the Subclass directive from XAML.

    Remarks

    See [MS-XAML] Section 5.3.8

  • SynchronousMode

    Gets a XamlDirective that enables loading XAML asynchronously if the XAML processor supports such a mode.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective SynchronousMode { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective that enables loading XAML asynchronously.

    Remarks

    A SynchronousMode directive (when set to Async) is used to specify that when a XAML file is loaded, the root node is processed first. The resulting object can be inserted even though its content is still processing. In this mode you can bypass the default XAML processing behavior of working from deepest node to the root. In the default processing logic for XAML, any caller that is waiting for the root object is blocked until the full parse is complete. SynchronousMode is not specified in [MS-XAML] but is part of the x namespacedefined behavior for XAML in WPF beginning in .NET Framework version 3.5 with SP1 (or any subsequent service pack).

  • TimeSpan

    Gets a XamlType for the TimeSpan concept in XAML language.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlType TimeSpan { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlType

      A XamlType for the TimeSpan XAML language concept.

    Remarks

    See [MS-XAML] Section 5.2.16. TimeSpan is not a true intrinsic, but was specified in the XAML specification because it is a commonly used type. The XAML specification authors considered it useful to standardize the XAML representation in derived vocabularies. See also Built-in Types for Common XAML Language Primitives.

  • Type

    Gets a XamlType for the Type/TypeExtension XAML language intrinsic.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlType Type { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlType

      A XamlType for the Type/TypeExtension XAML language intrinsic.

    Remarks

    This XAML type provides XamlType values that use bindings from, and lookups to, a backing type system. The XAML type is (or must be) assignable to MarkupExtension. See [MS-XAML] Section 5.2.3.

  • TypeArguments

    Gets a XamlDirective for the TypeArguments directive from XAML.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective TypeArguments { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective for the TypeArguments directive from XAML.

    Remarks

    A TypeArguments directive specifies the type constraints of a generic when a generic is specified as a XAML object. See [MS-XAML] Section 5.3.11.

  • Uid

    Gets a XamlDirective for the Uid directive from XAML.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective Uid { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective for the Uid directive from XAML.

    Remarks

    A Uid directive specifies a unique identifier for a XAML markup element. Strictly speaking, such a unique identifier could be applied to several purposes within a XAML-implementing framework. Uid differs from Name in that Name has a specific role in the [MS-XAML] definition for declaring the identifiers that exist in an object graph output from a XAML source, whereas Uid has no specific role. In the existing XAML-implementing frameworks that use .NET Framework XAML Services, Uid is typically used for localization purposes. See [MS-XAML] Section 5.3.6.

  • UnknownContent

    Gets a XamlDirective for the UnknownContent directive from XAML.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlDirective UnknownContent { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlDirective

      A XamlDirective for the UnknownContent directive from XAML.

    Remarks

    UnknownContent is a directive that is a placeholder to use in a XAML node set if a reader encounters unknown content for a value node or initialization text (no available intrinsic or text syntax can convert it).

    If you are looking at raw node interpretations or visualizations, UnknownContent is sometimes seen in string form as _UnknownContent (note the leading underscore) and is within the XAML language XAML namespace (as notated by a preceding Namespace node).

  • Uri

    Gets a XamlType for the Uri XAML language concept.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlType Uri { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlType

      A XamlType for the Uri XAML language concept.

    Remarks

    See [MS-XAML] Section 5.2.15. Uri is not a true intrinsic but was specified in the XAML specification because it is a frequently used type. The XAML specification authors considered it useful to standardize the XAML representation in derived vocabularies. See also Built-in Types for Common XAML Language Primitives.

  • XamlNamespaces

    Gets a collection of the namespace identifiers for XAML.

    public static System.Collections.Generic.IList<string> XamlNamespaces { get; }

    Property Value

    • IList<String>

      A collection of the namespace identifiers for XAML.

    Remarks

    Currently this collection contains only the Xaml2006Namespacevalue.

  • XData

    Gets a XamlType for the XAML type that backs an XData block in XAML.

    public static System.Xaml.XamlType XData { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlType

      The XamlType for the XAML type that backs an XData block. See [MS-XAML] Section 5.2.23.

  • XmlNamespaces

    Gets a collection of the namespace identifiers for XML.

    public static System.Collections.Generic.IList<string> XmlNamespaces { get; }

    Property Value

    • IList<String>

      A collection of the namespace identifiers for XML.

    Remarks

    Currently this collection contains only the Xml1998Namespacevalue.
